properties.description: This blueprint sets tag policy and role assignment on the subscription, creates a ResourceGroup, and deploys a resource template and role assignment to that ResourceGroup.

metadata.displayName: The name of the tag to provide the policy assignment.
The value of the tag to provide the policy assignment.

metadata.description: List of AAD object IDs that will be assigned Contributor role at the subscription
List of AAD object IDs that will be assigned Owner role at the resource group

storageRG.description: Contains the resource template deployment and a role assignment.
